mapper.select: SELECT id, name, password, email, date_of_birth dateOfBirth, phone_num phoneNo, role FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, name, password, email, date_of_birth, phone_num, role ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{phoneNo}, #{role} )
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT id from user where id = #{id})

SELECT G.id, G.title, G.genre, G.description, G.release_date releaseDate, G.price, G.developer, G.publisher, G.rating, G.sales, G.status, U.id, U.name, P.purchase_date purchaseDate, P.purchase_id purchaseId FROM game G, purchase P, user U WHERE P.user_id = #{userId} AND P.game_id = G.id AND P.user_id = U.id
